entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a professor who has been lowered to the empty glass by Harry. He shakes his head, closes his eyes, and drinks from the goblet again.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is watching Dumbledore anxiously, wondering if he's in pain. He grips the rim of the basin tightly.

entities.name: goblet
entities.description: The goblet is being drained by Dumbledore and refilled with liquid from the basin.

entities.name: basin
entities.description: The basin contains liquid that is used to refill the goblet.

relationships.description: Dumbledore drinks from the goblet, which is being drained and refilled by him.
Harry grips the rim of the basin tightly with his hands.
Dumbledore uses the basin to refill the goblet with liquid.
